Generation IX.Scarlet: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.
Generation IX.Violet: It lives at the bottom of ponds and swamps. It will carry Wooper on its back and ferry them across water from one shore to the other.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Five , Area Six East Province: Area Three West Province: Area Three North Province: Area One , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Five , Area Six East Province: Area Three West Province: Area Three North Province: Area One , Glaseado Mountain Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
